subject: Leadership
title: Purpose-Driven Leadership
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Purpose-Driven Leadership.

hook.text: Profit is fuel, not destination. Leaders who lead with purpose inspire loyalty that paychecks alone can never buy.

buildup.text: Sinek's golden circle: start with why. People don't buy what you do; they buy why you do it.

discovery.text: Purpose-driven companies outperform the S&P 500 by 14x over 15 years. Purpose isn't soft. It's strategic.

twist.text: Purpose imposed from the top feels hollow. Real purpose is co-created and lived daily, not printed on a poster.

climax.text: Articulate your why. Connect daily work to the larger mission. Revisit purpose in every major decision.

punchline.text: People will forget what you did. They'll remember why you did it.

quiz.question: Why does purpose drive better business performance?
options: Purpose inspires loyalty and engagement that paychecks alone cannot
Purpose has no measurable business impact
